https://github.com/spack/spack/blob/9ac207c901c46d005a8cce1460fa110192af6cb5/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/pcre2/package.py#L15

The FTP server https://ftp.pcre.org/pub/pcre/ went permanently offline, these releases have moved to Github (https://github.com/PhilipHazel/pcre2/releases), but no tarballs to releases prior to 10.37 are on Github. @PhilipHazel could you potentially upload prior releases to tags on Github?

> Note that the former ftp.pcre.org FTP site is no longer available. You will need to update any scripts that download PCRE source code to download via HTTPS, Git, or Subversion from the new home on GitHub instead.
title: Tarball downloads for `prce2` will eventually fail
